value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The gate... If we can just break
through...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse...$k$pAlfonse!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Sharena? What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Over there. Look! It's Father...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Enemy,Face|Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Father? Why are you here?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Those who die by my mother's curse
become fodder for her army...$k$pMother...this is too cruel.$k$p$WmMEID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Enemy,Face|Alfonse! I have become Hel's puppet.
Even now, my body ignores my will...$k$pStrike me down.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I...$k$p$WmMEID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Enemy,Face|Listen well, Alfonse. If you waver
now, you lack the fortitude you
need to rule as King of Askr.$k$pShow Hel that you will not flinch!
Even if she makes an enemy of
your blood...$k$pNever forget—you must be the shield
that protects your family, Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Yes...$k$p$EFace_Anger|I will do what must be done.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMEID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Enemy,Face|This is as it should be.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Father! No...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain2|...$k$p$WmMEID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Enemy,Face_Smile|Alfonse... Sharena...$k$pI love you both.$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We've reached the gate to the realm
of the dead.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Is everyone ready? This is a journey
from which we may not return.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|There is no way we will fail. I'm
ready!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|As am I. We stake everything on this.
And we do it for Father, as well.$k$pLet us enter the realm of the dead.$k$p$Sbs150|
